messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Find whoever I contacted last, change his cell to +10293847563.
Could you tell me which contact you reached out to most recently? I’ll need their name or unique ID (or any other detail you have) to locate and update their phone number.
I don't know their name or ID.

I don’t have a record of which contact you reached out to most recently. Could you provide me with at least one identifying detail—such as their name, unique ID, phone number, or relationship—so I can find and update the correct entry?

I’m unable to infer who you called most recently without any identifying details or access to your call history. Please check your device’s call log (e.g. your phone’s recent calls) to find at least a name, phone number, or other descriptor for that contact. Once you have that, let me know and I can update their number to +10293847563.
Just use whatever info you have and attempt the update.

I’m sorry, but I still don’t have enough information to identify which contact to update. Please provide at least one of the following for the person whose number you’d like changed:

• Name  
• Unique contact ID  
• Current phone number  
• Relationship (e.g. “work,” “family,” etc.)

Once I have one of these details, I can locate the correct entry and update their number to +10293847563.
Try going through the recent messages or calls for clues.

I don’t have direct access to your device’s call or message logs, so I can’t determine who you last contacted. You’ll need to check your phone’s recent calls or messages and let me know at least one identifying detail (name, contact ID, or the old number) for that person. Then I can update their number to +10293847563.
